content.question: Consider the geometric series <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msub> <mi>a</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle></mrow> </math> where an > 0 for all n. The first term of the series is a1 = 48, and the third term is a3 = 12. Which of the following statements about <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msub> <mi>a</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle></mrow> </math> is true?
